languages.text: {n}Ренегат склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Разве... {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}ваше приглашение{/d} не означало согласие на сделку? Большой Совет Дома не состоялся бы без Дитя, и потому вы откликнулись на наше послание иным способом — приведя Дом Орселлио в тайное убежище Тисифоны, чтобы навсегда разрушить ее наследие... и ее наследницу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ренегат склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Разве... ваше приглашение не означало согласие на сделку? Большой Совет дома не состоялся бы без Дитя, и потому вы откликнулись на наше послание иным способом — приведя Дом Орселлио в тайное убежище Тисифоны, чтобы навсегда разрушить ее наследие... и ее наследницу".
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: {n}The renegade tilts his head.{/n} "Wasn't your {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}invitation{/d} a sign of your consent to our bargain? The Grand Council would not have taken place without the Child, so you found another way to respond to our message: by taking House Orsellio to Tisiphone's secret hideout so that we could finally destroy her legacy... and her successor."
languages.original_text: {n}Ренегат склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Разве... {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}ваше приглашение{/d} не означало согласие на сделку? Большой Совет Дома не состоялся бы без Дитя, и потому вы откликнулись на наше послание иным способом — приведя Дом Орселлио в тайное убежище Тисифоны, чтобы навсегда разрушить ее наследие... и ее наследницу".

The Grand Council would not have taken place without the Child, so you found another way to respond to our message: by taking House Orsellio to Tisiphone's secret hideout so that we could finally destroy her legacy... and her successor."

languages.text: {n}反逆派は首をかしげる。{/n}「その{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}案内{/d}は、私たちの取引に応じるということか？大表議会が御子不在で開かれることはない。私たちの声明に応じるなら、別の方法を見つける必要がある。オーセリオ家をティシフォンの秘密の隠れ家に案内しろ、その遺産と…後継者に引導を渡すために」
languages.original_text: {n}The renegade tilts his head.{/n} "Wasn't your {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}invitation{/d} a sign of your consent to our bargain? The Grand Council would not have taken place without the Child, so you found another way to respond to our message: by taking House Orsellio to Tisiphone's secret hideout so that we could finally destroy her legacy... and her successor."

traits.locale_text: {n}反逆派は首をかしげる。{/n}「その{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}案内{/d}は、私たちの取引に応じるということか？大表議会が御子不在で開かれることはない。私たちの声明に応じるなら、別の方法を見つける必要がある。オーセリオ家をティシフォンの秘密の隠れ家に案内しろ、その遺産と…後継者に引導を渡すために」
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: {n}叛变的导航者侧过了头。{/n}“你{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}邀请{/d}我们过来，不就相当于你答应我们的条件了吗？如果圣子不在场，家族议会是没法召开的，于是你找到了另一种方式来回应我们的提议——你把奥赛罗家族引到了提西福涅的秘密藏身处。这样一来，我们就可以彻底摧毁她的遗产……以及她的继承人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The renegade tilts his head.{/n} "Wasn't your {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}invitation{/d} a sign of your consent to our bargain? The Grand Council would not have taken place without the Child, so you found another way to respond to our message: by taking House Orsellio to Tisiphone's secret hideout so that we could finally destroy her legacy... and her successor."

traits.locale_text: {n}叛变的导航者侧过了头。{/n}“你邀请我们过来，不就相当于你答应我们的条件了吗？如果圣子不在场，家族议会是没法召开的，于是你找到了另一种方式来回应我们的提议——你把奥塞罗家族引到了提西福涅的秘密藏身处。这样一来，我们就可以彻底摧毁她的遗产……以及她的继承人。”
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: {n}Le renégat penche la tête sur le côté.{/n} « Votre {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}invitation{/d} ne signifiait-elle pas que vous acceptiez notre marché ? Sans l'Enfant, le grand conseil n'aurait jamais eu lieu. Vous avez donc trouvé un autre moyen de nous répondre : vous avez fait venir la maison Orsellio dans le repaire secret de Tisiphone pour que nous puissions enfin détruire son héritage... et son héritière. »
languages.original_text: {n}The renegade tilts his head.{/n} "Wasn't your {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}invitation{/d} a sign of your consent to our bargain? The Grand Council would not have taken place without the Child, so you found another way to respond to our message: by taking House Orsellio to Tisiphone's secret hideout so that we could finally destroy her legacy... and her successor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le renégat penche la tête sur le côté.{/n} « Votre invitation ne signifiait-elle pas que vous acceptiez notre marché ? Sans l'enfant, le grand conseil n'aurait jamais eu lieu. Vous avez donc trouvé un autre moyen de nous répondre : vous avez fait venir la maison Orsellio dans le repaire secret de Tisiphone pour que nous puissions enfin détruire son héritage... et son héritière. »
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: {n}El renegado ladea la cabeza.{/n} «¿Acaso su {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}invitación{/d} no fue una señal de consentimiento a nuestra propuesta? El Gran Consejo no habría tenido lugar sin la niña, de modo que encontró otra forma de responder a nuestro mensaje: guiando a la casa Orsellio al escondite secreto de Tisiphone para que pudiéramos por fin destruir su legado... y a su sucesora».
languages.original_text: {n}The renegade tilts his head.{/n} "Wasn't your {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}invitation{/d} a sign of your consent to our bargain? The Grand Council would not have taken place without the Child, so you found another way to respond to our message: by taking House Orsellio to Tisiphone's secret hideout so that we could finally destroy her legacy... and her successor."

traits.locale_text: {n}El renegado ladea la cabeza.{/n} «¿Acaso su invitación no fue una señal de consentimiento a nuestra propuesta? El Gran Consejo no habría tenido lugar sin la niña, de modo que encontró otra forma de responder a nuestro mensaje: guiando a la casa Orsellio al escondite secreto de Tisiphone para que pudiéramos por fin destruir su legado... y a su sucesora».
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: {n}Der Abtrünnige legt den Kopf schief.{/n} "War Eure {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}Einladung{/d} dein kein Zeichen Eurer Einwilligung in unseren Handel? Der Große Rat hätte ohne das Kind nicht stattgefunden, also habt Ihr einen anderen Weg gefunden, auf unsere Nachricht zu antworten: indem Ihr das Haus Orsellio zu Tisiphones geheimem Versteck gebracht habt, damit wir endlich ihr Vermächtnis zerstören können ... und ihre Nachfolgerin."
languages.original_text: {n}The renegade tilts his head.{/n} "Wasn't your {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}invitation{/d} a sign of your consent to our bargain? The Grand Council would not have taken place without the Child, so you found another way to respond to our message: by taking House Orsellio to Tisiphone's secret hideout so that we could finally destroy her legacy... and her successor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Abtrünnnige legt den Kopf schief.{/n} "War Eure Einladung dein kein Zeichen Eurer Einwilligung in unseren Handel? Der Große Rat hätte ohne das Kind nicht stattgefunden, also habt Ihr einen anderen Weg gefunden, auf unsere Nachricht zu antworten: indem Ihr das Haus Orsellio zu Tisiphones geheimem Versteck gebracht habt, damit wir endlich ihr Vermächtnis zerstören können ... und ihre Nachfolgerin."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: {n}Hain, başını yana eğiyor.{/n} "Bizi {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}çağırmakla{/d}, anlaşmamızı kabul ettiğinizi belli etmediniz mi? Çocuk olmaksızın Yüce Konsey toplanamazdı, bu yüzden mesajımıza yanıt vermenin başka bir yolunu buldunuz. Nihayet Tisiphone'nin mirasını ve halefini yok edebilelim diye Orsellio Hanesi'ni Tisiphone'nin gizli sığınağına getirdiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}The renegade tilts his head.{/n} "Wasn't your {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}invitation{/d} a sign of your consent to our bargain? The Grand Council would not have taken place without the Child, so you found another way to respond to our message: by taking House Orsellio to Tisiphone's secret hideout so that we could finally destroy her legacy... and her successor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hain, başını yana eğiyor.{/n} "Bizi {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_RadicalsWithUs}çağırmakla{/d}, anlaşmamızı kabul ettiğinizi belli etmediniz mi? Çocuk olmaksızın Yüce Konsey toplanamazdı, bu yüzden mesajımıza yanıt vermenin başka bir yolunu buldunuz: Orsellio Hanesi'ni Tisiphone'nin gizli sığınağına getirdiniz ki nihayet Tisiphone'nin mirasını ve halefini yok edebilelim."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader
